entry.def: A craftsman is a man who makes things skilfully with his hands.

example.ex: The table in the kitchen was made by a local craftsman.
example.tran: 厨房里的桌子是本地一位工匠制作的。

means.word_mean: 1. a professional whose work is consistently of high quality;

sentences.sentence: "as an actor he was a consummate craftsman"

means.word_mean: 2. a creator of great skill in the manual arts;

sentences.sentence: "the jewelry was made by internationally famous craftsmen"

means.word_mean: 3. a skilled worker who practices some trade or handicraft
